title: Betplay Group
author: Betplay Group
content: Are you ready for some spooktacular Halloween treat? You will surely enjoy all the treats and the thrilling tricks we have in store for you!Betplay.io and Red Tiger invite you to join the “HELLOWIN!” tournament. A prize pool worth EUR 10,000 will be granted to the winners of this event. Bring a large tote bag so you may fill it up with additional candies as this series is a 10-day tournament.Tournament Schedule:The exciting event will begin on 22nd October 2022, 12:00 p.m. GMT+8 until 1st November 2022, 11:59 a.m. GMT+8.The event's minimum bet is 0.20 USD/ 0.50 EUR. Additionally, the competition is available in the following currencies: CNY, IDR, INR, KRW, MMK, MYR, PHP, PKR, THB, TND, HKD, and VND. The gamer only has to participate by playing any Red Tiger game (all Red Tiger games are included). After the competition, the winners will be revealed one working day later. The monetary equivalent of the awards will be credited to the player's primary wallet. More victories boost their chances of ranking higher, lastly each day, monetary awards will be given to the top 30 participants.Join us if you dare! Welcome to our Nightmare! If you have any questions concerning the campaign, feel free to contact us via our live chat service.
